sentences.sContent: No wonder they drink, smoke, fight, carouse and otherwise engage in inappropriate social behavior.
sentences.sContent_eng: No wonder they drink, smoke, fight, carouse and otherwise engage in inappropriate social behavior.
sentences.sCn: 难怪他们喝酒、抽烟、打架、狂欢作乐或者做出不当的社会举动。

synos.tran: 喧闹的酒会或宴会；一饮而尽

remMethod.val: car + (r)ouse(唤起) → 开着汽车欢闹 → 狂饮寻乐
